prod_desc: Watch little bus drivers go places as they build and play!
prod_long_desc:
Toddlers will love to build and rebuild this cute yellow bus for endless driving fun. This simple set helps develop fine motor and construction skills, while the window bricks decorated with characters encourage role-play. LEGO® DUPLO® bricks are specially designed to be safe for little hands.
Features a buildable bus with wheels.
Also includes double-sided window bricks decorated with characters as story starters.
Toddlers will love driving the cute yellow bus around everywhere.
Build and rebuild into all sorts of different vehicles.
Help your child master basic building skills with this simple model.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 1½-3 years.
Bus measures over 2” high, 3” long and 2” wide.
